div.p: This code system http://www.cms.gov/place-of-service defines many codes, but they are not represented here

description.value: Place of Service codes are placed on health care professional claims to indicate the setting in which a service was provided. CMS Place of Service codes are available at https://www.cms.gov/Medicare/Coding/place-of-service-codes/Place_of_Service_Code_Set.html.

copyright.value: CMS codes are available for use. As HL7 is working with the owning authority to finalize the url, this url is subject to change.
